title: Let’s Get Pumped Up!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Yesterday’s event was so much fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>We got really close to everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes, being able to hear everyone’s voices directly made it such a wonderful event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s nice to have events where we can enjoy chatting, too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You’re right. We’re able to learn a lot from the feedback we receive.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yup! I discovered something new I want to try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I hope we can talk a lot with everyone again today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! And let’s make today even more exciting than yesterday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Oh! To do that, first...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah! Emma’s sandwiches!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Wow, thank you so much! Let’s eat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>With these, we’ll be able to charge up our power completely!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
